actionCalls.name: Get_Salesforce_base_and_record_url
actionCalls.label: Get Salesforce base and record url

decisions.name: Changing_new_fields_value_based_on_condition
decisions.label: Changing new fields value based on condition

decisions.name: check_if_referral_by_customer_is_empty_or_not
decisions.label: check if referral by customer is empty or not

decisions.name: check_if_sourcing_manager_and_referral_by_customer_is_empty_or_not
decisions.label: check if sourcing manager and referral by customer is empty or not

rules.name: Walk_in_source_is_not_same
rules.label: Walk in source is not same

decisions.name: if_content_version_is_not_empty
decisions.label: if content version is not empty

rules.name: check_opportunity_owner_is_null_or_not
rules.label: check opportunity owner is null or not

formulas.name: formula1
formulas.expression: IF({!Walk_in_Source} == 'Channel Partner', 'Sourcing Partner : ' + {!Sourcing_Partner.recordName} + BR() + BR() + 'Channel Partner : ' + {!ChannelPartner.recordName}, '')

formulas.name: Formula2
formulas.expression: CASE( {!Get_Opportunities.Walk_in_Source__c}, 'Referred by Others', 'Previous Values' + BR() + BR() + 'Referral Type : ' + TEXT({!Get_Opportunities.Referral_Type__c})+ BR() + BR() + 'Referral Name : ' + {!Get_Opportunities.Referral_Name__c} + BR() + BR() + 'Referral Mobile Number : ' + {!Get_Opportunities.Referral_Mobile_Number__c}, 'Referred by Existing Customer', 'Previous Values' + BR() + BR() + 'Referral By Customer : ' +{!get_referal_by_customer.Name}, 'Channel Partner', 'Previous Values' + BR() + BR() + 'Sourcing Partner : ' + {!get_Sourcing_manager.Name} + BR() + BR() + 'Channel Partner : ' + {!Get_Opportunities.Channel_Partner__r.Name}, '' )

formulas.name: formula3
formulas.expression: IF({!Walk_in_Source} == 'Referred by Existing Customer', 'Referral By Customer : ' + {!Referral_By_Customer.recordName}, '')

formulas.name: formula4
formulas.expression: IF({!Walk_in_Source} == 'Referred by Others', 'Referral Type : ' + {!Referral_Type}+ BR() +BR() + 'Referral Name : ' + {!Referral_Name} + BR() +BR() + 'Referral Mobile Number : ' +{!Referral_mobile_number.value}, '')

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Message
fields.fieldText: Source change request is already in Approval.

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText: Walk-in-Source is Same as Input Value

textTemplates.name: emailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
{!get_opp_owner.Name}Dear {!User_Loop.userId},


We would like to inform you about a recent source change request associated with an opportunity.


Name: {!Get_Opportunities.Name}

Project: {!Get_Opportunities.Project__r.Name}

Current Source: {!Get_Opportunities.Walk_in_Source__c}

Requested Source: {!Walk_in_Source}

Comments: {!Reason_For_Source_Change}

{!formula1}

{!formula3}

{!formula4}

{!Formula2}

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Please Click Here:- {!varT_OfferFullUrl}

Warm Regards,

{!get_opp_owner.Name}

textTemplates.name: notificationBody
textTemplates.text: Approval Request for source has sent for Opportunity {!Get_Opportunities.Name}.
